languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}Комм-бусина{/g} оживает, и сквозь ужасные помехи до вас доносится голос Вигдис:{/n} "Лорд... итан, это... вокса! Пожалуйста, сообщите... я... немедленно высылаю..."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}Комм-бусина{/g} оживает, и сквозь ужасные помехи до вас доносится голос Вигдис:{/n} "Лорд... итан, это... вокса! Пожалуйста, сообщите... я... немедленно высылаю..."

languages.text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} comes alive. Vigdis's voice struggles to get through the thundering static.{/n} "Lord... tain, this is... x Master! Please sta... ll immed... ly send a..."

languages.text: {n}Dein {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}Komm-Stecker{/g} erwacht zum Leben. Vigdis' Stimme müht sich, das donnernde Rauschen zu durchdringen.{/n} "Lord... ...tain, hier spricht ... ...xmeisterin! Bitte blei... ...den unverzüg... ...icht senden ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} comes alive. Vigdis's voice struggles to get through the thundering static.{/n} "Lord... tain, this is... x Master! Please sta... ll immed... ly send a..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}Komm-Stecker{/g} erwacht zum Leben. Vigdis' Stimme müht sich, das donnernde Rauschen zu durchdringen.{/n} "Lord... ...tain, hier spricht ... ...xmeisterin! Bitte blei... ...den unverzüg... ...icht senden ..."

languages.text: {n}Votre {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}communicateur{/g} s'active. La voix de Vigdis peine à se faire entendre par-dessus les parasites bruyants.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}... taine, ici... esse-vox ! Veuillez pat... vais imméd... ment envoyer un... »
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} comes alive. Vigdis's voice struggles to get through the thundering static.{/n} "Lord... tain, this is... x Master! Please sta... ll immed... ly send a..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}communicateur{/g} s'active. La voix de Vigdis peine à se faire entendre par-dessus les parasites bruyants.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}... ... taine, ici... ...esse-vox ! Veuillez... ... ll imméd... ... ment envoyer un... »

languages.text: {n}你的{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}通讯珠{/g}响了起来。在雷鸣般的静电噪音中，隐约能听到维格迪斯的声音。{/n}“舰……大人，这里是……大师！请……立……派遣……”
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} comes alive. Vigdis's voice struggles to get through the thundering static.{/n} "Lord... tain, this is... x Master! Please sta... ll immed... ly send a..."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}通讯珠{/g}响了起来。在雷鸣般的静电噪音中，隐约能听到维格迪斯的声音。{/n}“舰……大人，这里是……大师！请……立……派遣……”

languages.text: {n}あなたの{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}通信機{/g}から声が聞こえる。ヴィグディスの声が轟音の中を通り抜けようとしている。{/n}「ロード…プテン、これは…マスター！お願いし…すぐに送信…を…」
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} comes alive. Vigdis's voice struggles to get through the thundering static.{/n} "Lord... tain, this is... x Master! Please sta... ll immed... ly send a..."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}通信機{/g}から声が聞こえる。ヴィグディスの声が轟音の中を通り抜けようとしている。{/n}「ロード…プテン、これは…マスター！お願いし…すぐに送信…を…」

languages.text: {n}Tu {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}cuenta de comunicaciones{/g} cobra vida. La voz de Vigdis se abre paso con dificultad a través de la atronadora estática.{/n} «¡Lord... ...tán, aquí... maestra de vo...! No se mu... viaremos... inmed...».
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} comes alive. Vigdis's voice struggles to get through the thundering static.{/n} "Lord... tain, this is... x Master! Please sta... ll immed... ly send a..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}cuenta de comunicación{/g} cobra vida. La voz de Vigdis se abre paso con dificultad a través de la atronadora estática.{/n} «¡Lord... ...tán, aquí... maestra... vo...! No se mu, ... encias... viaremos... inmed...».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}Mikro telsizin{/g} birden canlanıveriyor. Vigdis'in sesi, boğuk statik gürültüsünü aşmakta zorlanıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, Voks Üs... Konuşuyor! Lütfen bekl... Derhâl ora... Gönderiy..."
languages.original_text: {n}Your {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g} comes alive. Vigdis's voice struggles to get through the thundering static.{/n} "Lord... tain, this is... x Master! Please sta... ll immed... ly send a..."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}Mikro telsiz{/g}inden sesler yükseliyor. Vigdis'in sesi, boğuk statik gürültüsü arasında zar zor seçilebiliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, ben... Üstat! Lütfen... Acil... Gönderim..."
